results.title: Here’s What We Know About the Walmart Shooting in Virginia

results.title: Army Veteran Went Into ‘Combat Mode’ to Disarm the Club Q Gunman
results.abstract: Richard M. Fierro, who served for 15 years in the military, was at the nightclub in Colorado Springs with his family when the gunman opened fire. “I just knew I had to take him down,” he said.

results.title: Justice Dept. Seeking to Question Pence in Jan. 6 Investigation

results.title: Herschel Walker, Running in Georgia, Receives Tax Break for Texas Residents
results.abstract: Mr. Walker, Georgia’s Republican nominee for Senate, is benefiting from a homestead exemption meant for primary residents of Texas.

results.title: Late Night Can’t Wait to Finally See Trump’s Tax Returns
results.abstract: Jimmy Kimmel joked that Trump “promised to release his tax returns more times than he promised to release Melania.”

media.caption: “Democrats will only have a few weeks to access those documents before the Republicans retake the House and make them disappear,” Kimmel said. “Basically, Trump’s tax returns are like a close friend’s Instagram story.”
